description: Remove Emojis from TUI - Remove pictographic emoji characters while keeping simple ASCII/Unicode symbols, redesign controls bar with bordered containers, replace emojis with text labels

userStories.title: Redesign controls bar with bordered group containers and no emojis
userStories.description: As a user, I want the controls bar to show shortcut key and label on the same line inside bordered group containers, without emoji icons, so controls are clean and scannable.
acceptanceCriteria: Remove the Emoji field from the Control struct in controls.go
Remove all emoji values from GetControlGroups() control definitions
Each control renders as a single line: [Key] Label
Each control group is wrapped in a bordered container using RenderInfoBox with the group name as the header
Groups are stacked vertically in Column 1
Controls within a group are listed one per line inside the container
Typecheck passes (CGO_ENABLED=0 go vet ./...)

userStories.title: Remove pictographic emojis from status bar
userStories.description: As a user, I want the status bar to use short text labels instead of pictographic emojis for mute and overlay indicators.
acceptanceCriteria: Keep play and pause icons — these are simple Unicode symbols
Replace mute emoji with text MUTED
Replace overlay emoji with text OVL
Status bar remains properly aligned with left/right content at all widths
Typecheck/lint passes

userStories.title: Remove pictographic emojis from mini player
userStories.description: As a user, I want the mini player to use text labels instead of pictographic emojis.
acceptanceCriteria: Keep play and pause icons — same as status bar
Replace mute emoji with text MUTED
Replace warning emoji with text ! or WARNING:
Mini player auto-sizing still works correctly with new text widths
Typecheck/lint passes

userStories.title: Remove medal emojis from stats panel
userStories.description: As a user, I want the stats panel leaderboard to use plain text rank numbers instead of medal emojis.
acceptanceCriteria: Replace gold medal emoji with #1
Replace silver medal emoji with #2
Replace bronze medal emoji with #3
Ranks 4 and 5 formatting consistent with 1-3 (e.g. #4, #5)
Bar graph block character is kept (block element, not emoji)
Column alignment in leaderboard is preserved
Typecheck/lint passes
